org.jacp.api.component

Interface IPerspectiveView<C,L,A,M>

  • Type Parameters:
    C - defines the base component where others extend from
    L - defines the action listener type
    A - defines the basic action type
    M - defines the basic message type
    All Superinterfaces:
    IComponent<L,A,M>, IDeclarative, IHandleable<A,M>, IPerspective<L,A,M>, IRootComponent<ISubComponent<L,A,M>,IAction<A,M>>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AFXPerspective

    public interface IPerspectiveView<C,L,A,M>
extends IPerspective<L,A,M>, IDeclarative
    This interface defines perspective components with visible ui.
    Author:
    Andy Moncsek
